name: Michael Gledhill
missionStatement: Motivated to serve as a U.S. Air Force pilot while advancing aerospace education and leadership excellence
bio: Motivated Civil Air Patrol cadet with strong leadership, cybersecurity, and aviation experience. Proven under pressure, highly driven, and committed to excellence. Passionate about aerospace, technology, and service. Aspires to become a U.S. Air Force pilot with interests in commercial aviation and aircraft systems or maintenance engineering.

As a dedicated Civil Air Patrol cadet, I am committed to advancing aerospace education and developing leadership skills. My journey through CAP has been marked by progressive responsibility, mentoring younger cadets, and a passion for aviation. I believe in leading by example and fostering a culture of excellence within our squadron.
capInvolvement: Since June 2023, I have advanced quickly through the CAP ranks to Cadet Captain, earning honor credit through the Mitchell Award. On track for promotion to Captain in September 2025. I have held multiple leadership roles including Cadet Commander, Flight Commander, Public Affairs Officer, and served as CAC Representative at Group and Wing levels. My CAP experience has shaped my values of integrity, leadership, and service to community.
